post.body: it makes me feel like a whore too... But where are you going to find one at Pac Fair?
cool... Can you also pickup my dry cleaning. Thanks.
great news... But some of us don't need the wipe ones!!!!
raining and cool on the Gold Coast
best public health notice I've ever seen!!!!!!
I'll pretend I didn't see this post so the photo can still keep me entertained on lonely nights.
and apparently Monopoly was released overnight if board games are your thing.
gosh! That won't get through the Internet filter.
hate them. Same as me. Play with the new stuff at nb and order from apple. But they did pick up this year. But damage done.
amazing how Next Byte has lufted their customer service now that Apple Stores are here. Too late!
they'll find out when no-one can get to a web page about The Virgin Mary. Shame church shame!
you're welcome to my fridge contents... Two ice cubes and a light bulb but I'll share!
I'll toss in my 2 cents if you want. But my training us in simple and clean. That's why I love apple!
in the world! Gosh... Can't even blame iPhone for that one!
amen! I have the best friends in the works!
My plan exactly!
hurry up 4pm!!!!
same here! And no-one needs their beauty sleep more than I!
I have flashes of light in the distance like there is a strange alien war being fought. Great show!
Wow!!!! thanks for the heads up! How do you program that???? That's f'ing magic!!!!
things are ALWAYS simple. We complicate them when they don't suit us.
I do it all on-line... Plus I don't care if people like what I got them!
no need to shout... We're already awake. Feeling less stressed this morning I hope!
grrrrr! How hateful!
street full of children laughing and playing and singing... Makes me want to puke! Bah humbug!
street full of children laughing and playing and singing... Makes me want to puke! Bag humbug!
2nd last time for me... And I almost called in sick.
Who doesn't??????
yes they must die! But not until I get a really good recipe for plum sauce!
or you forget chapters because they were so true they hurt. I don't re-read books anymore.
don't you hate it when u read a book again and the ending is the same?
also the studios won't release near the back catalogue as the USA. Regions are stupid. One region = one manufact run!
blame the studios. Why would I wait 8 months to by a tv box set from them when I can have it from Amazon today and pay bit more
She must die!
I'm trying not to be too obvious by asking for a photo that will keep me company on cold lonely nights... Not a good look.
it needs the atom attched to it. Easiest way is to drop it in iTunes and select convert to iPhone. Handbrake works too.
I can still see the flashes in the distance over the river! Enjoy!
come around - there's wine and beer too!
BOM shows you got a bit to go yet. I'll keep fingers and toes crossed for u!
Capri is good! Let me know if u need anything!
have a blast!!! Hope it's as good for u as it was for me!
absolutely!!!! Just waiting for exchange rate to get better! Hopefully when Obama gets in!
you'll have come over to have a beer and watch Stormchasers! Jad who just moved up is also a storm fan!
I suggest that it's not a metal frame one and you have a nice chardy with the show. Still lightning here!
amazing ladder lightning just turning night into day! Fantastic! Q1 got several hits!
I wouldn't climb up there right now!!!!
Where there is no fear, evil can not feed. Approach evil only with perfect courage or it will destroy your soul!
Pure evil is 30 minutes late for battle. No doubt to unfocus me.
About to do battle with what I believe now to be pure evil. I'll let you know how it goes... Or not... http://snipurl.com/82q0b
I'm gonna hit someone today... I can feel it coming!!!!!!!!
Last piece of the puzzle! No going back now... Thank God! http://snipurl.com/7orpf
Yah! My best mate Jad is moving up from Sydney today! You can close the border now!
There's a big storm acomin'
Little Beans breakfast with Jad and Damo where the most beautiful waitress on the GC works. http://snipurl.com/9a2y1
Wow! Think I've been out of the pool for only 2 hours since 7am.
Gotta love the natural beauty of the GC! http://snipurl.com/98mg8
Bedtime! Holidays can be very tiring If done correctly.
Looks like it's wide enough to swipe the sunshine coast! Get the wine ready Kell!
Wow! It's daylight almost!
On upstairs balcony with jad and damo and wine! Perfect!
